edit-client-id.scope: openid ga4gh_passport_v1 account_admin identities profile offline_access

delete-client-id.scope: openid ga4gh_passport_v1 account_admin identities profile offline_access

accessTokenTtl.label: Access Token TTL
accessTokenTtl.description: The valid duration of an access token (for authentication and authorization purposes) requested from the login flow of the API

accountNameLength.label: Account Name Length
accountNameLength.description: The number of characters in a new account name generated by the identity concentrator (previously existing IC accounts are unaffected)

authCodeTokenTtl.label: Authorization Code TTL
authCodeTokenTtl.description: The valid duration of an authorization code requested from the login flow of the API (auth codes must be converted into another token before this expiry)

claimTtlCap.label: Claim TTL Cap
claimTtlCap.description: A maximum duration of how long individual claims can be cached and used before requiring them to be refreshed from the authority issuing the claim

defaultPassportTokenTtl.label: Default Passport Token TTL
defaultPassportTokenTtl.description: The duration of a passport TTL when no 'ttl' parameter is provided to the token minting endpoint

maxPassportTokenTtl.label: Maximum Passport Token TTL
maxPassportTokenTtl.description: Passport requests with a 'ttl' parameter exceeding this value will be refused

readOnlyMasterRealm.label: Read Only Master Realm
readOnlyMasterRealm.description: When 'true', the master realm becomes read-only and updates to the configuration must be performed via updating a config file

refreshTokenTtl.label: Refresh Token TTL
refreshTokenTtl.description: The valid duration of an refresh token requested from the refresh token flow of the API

whitelistedRealms.label: Whitelisted Realms
whitelistedRealms.description: By default any realm name can be created, but when this option is populated the IC will only allow realms on this list to be created (the master realm is allowed implicitly)
